lines: CS 318AH 247CH 279SDAH 316
146BUUMI BWAKO MULI NDIME
THY LIFE WITHIN ME
Doh is Eb
Ndibike buumi bwako o Mwami wa bami,
Koba kwiingula kwangu, Mibuzyo nje buzya,
Ndibike buumi bwako, Koba nzila yangu,
Me ndi mulengwa wako, Ndi kupe bulemu
Cikombelo capegwa, Taci jisi zibi,
Ibulemu bwako busalazye mukati,
Nyika yonse yuumune mubili utafwi,
Mutwanga wako mwini we ula mutuma.
Ziindi zyonse ba twanga bako bala lindila,
Kuti uba belesye konse nkoyandisya,
Kulinda kwa luyando kutakwe kupenga,
Taaku kutyompwa lyonse, A mizeezo mibi.
Luumuno ndila jana na ndazwa mu zibi,
Ndiya kuku lindila limwi uka ndiite,
Ndibike buumi bwako o Mwami wa bami,
Koba kwiingula kwangu, Mibuzyo njebuzya.
